z/OS is a 64-bit operating system for IBM mainframe computers.

This product is no longer approved for information technology (IT) projects that are or will be mandated to follow standardized processes and tools governing IT activity critical to VA`s implementation of the Veteran-focused Integration Process (VIP). Projects to be governed by VIP are required to transition to the standardized tools by October 1, 2016. Please refer to the CIO memo dated January 4, 2016 that mandated specific criteria for being designated as VIP projects and the accompanying January 19, 2016 memo regarding OI&T project management and software/systems development standardized tools and repositories (see Reference tab).
